We can take apart $\green{5}$ to make $\pink4$ and $\blue1$.   
We can put together $\pink4$ and $\blue1$ to make $\green{5}$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$5-4=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $4=5$
